hero.title: Simple, transparent pricing
hero.description: Choose the tier that matches your travel style. Limits and features stay synced with your account plan.

backpacker.name: Backpacker
backpacker.description: A generous free tier to start planning with confidence.

explorer.name: Explorer
explorer.description: Higher limits, longer retention, and collaboration-ready editing.

globetrotter.name: Globetrotter
globetrotter.description: Top tier with unlimited scale and no trip expiry.

anonymousLimits.title: Anonymous access limits
anonymousLimits.description: Anonymous users can keep up to {limit} active trips at a time. Each anonymous trip stays editable for {days} days, then becomes locked until account activation.
anonymousLimits.footer: Create a free account to keep your planning history and unlock tier upgrades later.
